name: Mahindra Scorpio N
description: The price of Mahindra Scorpio N, a 6 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 13.85  - 24.54 Lakh. It is available in 34 variants, with engine options ranging from 1997 to 2184 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Scorpio N has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Mahindra Scorpio N has a ground clearance of 187 mm  and is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 14.83 to 15 kmpl for Scorpio N.
